translation:
My Most Excellent Sir,

I can no longer remain silent. Matos has been developing matters that ................. see these official letters and letters, and after comparing them with previous letters from the same Matos, tell me what judgment can be made of such a man. They tell me that the thief Casas is there. Ask him about the cunning regarding the 945 pesos he received from the Treasury and from Joaquim Pereira Fagundes. If this man comes to speak to me, he will get a slap in the face, for which I am already prepared.

From Your Excellency, Almeida
